text: The TH860 underground truck is designed with a reinforced chassis for handling heavy loads and rough terrain in mining operations.
Operators must ensure the LH410 loader's bucket pins are lubricated every 250 operating hours to prevent wear and tear.
The DR412i rotary drill offers advanced automation features, including remote operation and automated drill string handling.
To ensure maximum efficiency, the CH550 cone crusher requires calibration of the control settings before each use.
The MT65 truck is equipped with advanced suspension systems to minimize vibrations and enhance driver comfort during long shifts.
The LH621 loader can be fitted with an optional fire suppression system for enhanced safety in underground environments.
The DD320S jumbo drill features a dual-boom design, allowing for simultaneous drilling of two parallel blast holes.
The CV229 VSI crusher is ideal for producing high-quality manufactured sand and features wear-resistant components for extended use.
Operators must conduct a daily pre-operation check of the TH545i truck’s steering and brake systems to ensure safe handling.
The DS422i rock bolter includes a water-mist system to suppress dust during drilling, enhancing visibility and operator safety.
The LH115 loader’s compact size makes it ideal for narrow-vein mining, while its powerful engine delivers high productivity.
Ensure that the DX900i drill rig’s air compressor is inspected every 300 hours to maintain optimal drilling performance.
The JM1211 jaw crusher features an innovative toggle system that reduces wear on components and ensures efficient material crushing.
Operators of the TH320 truck must be trained in emergency evacuation protocols due to its application in hazardous underground environments.
The DD422iE drill uses a battery-electric power system to reduce emissions and improve energy efficiency in underground mining.
The LH514 loader’s hydraulic system allows for precise control of attachments, ensuring smooth operation in confined spaces.
The CV217 VSI crusher requires a biweekly inspection of rotor tips and wear plates to maintain consistent output quality.
The MT42 underground truck is equipped with an ergonomic operator cabin, featuring air conditioning and noise reduction systems.
The DD311 compact drill is designed for single-boom operations and is highly effective in small-scale mining projects.
The LH410 loader’s cooling system requires flushing and replacement of coolant every 1,500 hours to avoid overheating.
The QH331 cone crusher is fitted with a Hydrocone system, allowing for real-time monitoring and adjustment of settings.
The DP1500i drill rig features a canopy that meets FOPS/ROPS standards, providing enhanced operator protection during operations.
The LH202 loader is designed for narrow-vein mining, offering a payload capacity of 3.5 metric tons and a compact turning radius.
The TH663 truck is equipped with an automatic retarder system to control speed during downhill operations, ensuring safety and stability.
The DD422i drill can be programmed for semi-autonomous operation, reducing downtime and improving drilling precision in complex environments.
The LH514 loader's centralized lubrication system reduces the time required for maintenance, allowing operators to focus on production tasks.
Operators should inspect the CV217 crusher's belt tension weekly to prevent slippage and ensure consistent material throughput.
The MT65 truck features an advanced collision avoidance system, providing real-time alerts to prevent accidents in busy mining sites.
The DR410i drill rig supports high-precision GPS navigation for accurate hole placement, improving blasting results and reducing costs.
The LH621 loader is equipped with a rapid-fill fueling system, allowing for faster refueling times and reduced operational downtime.
The CH870i cone crusher features a spider bearing design that provides greater crushing force and operational stability.
The TH551i truck is compatible with telematics solutions, enabling remote monitoring of fuel consumption and performance metrics.
The DD320S drill is equipped with a water recycling system that minimizes water usage, making it environmentally friendly for drilling projects.
The LH517i loader’s operator cabin features joystick controls and an integrated display for real-time diagnostics.
Inspect the QJ341 jaw crusher’s feeder grizzly bars every 300 hours to ensure smooth feeding and prevent blockages.
The MT42 truck’s advanced braking system includes wet disc brakes for maximum stopping power, even on steep grades.
The DP1500i drill rig is capable of horizontal drilling for trenching applications, adding versatility to its operational use.
The LH514 loader’s tires are designed for high durability and can operate in temperatures as low as -30°C.
Operators must wear personal protective equipment (PPE) while performing maintenance on the CV228 VSI crusher to avoid injuries.
The TH320 truck’s compact design makes it ideal for maneuvering in narrow underground tunnels with limited space.
The DD422iE drill uses regenerative braking to recharge its batteries, improving energy efficiency during operations.
The LH410 loader’s automatic bucket leveling system reduces spillage and increases material handling efficiency.
The CH430 cone crusher’s tramp release system allows for quick clearing of blockages, minimizing downtime.
The TH551i truck’s onboard diagnostics provide real-time feedback on engine performance and operational parameters.
The DR410i drill rig’s automatic drill bit lubrication system extends the life of bits and reduces operational costs.
The LH621 loader’s reinforced bucket design allows for efficient handling of abrasive materials without premature wear.
The DD422i drill is equipped with a dual-motor drive system that enhances drilling speed and torque in hard rock conditions.
The MT65 truck’s engine has been optimized for fuel efficiency, consuming 20% less diesel compared to previous models.
The CH660 cone crusher includes an automatic overload protection system that safeguards critical components during operation.
The LH410 loader features a reinforced articulation joint, allowing it to handle continuous loads in high-stress environments.
The TH320 truck’s load-sensing hydraulics provide improved efficiency by optimizing power delivery based on load requirements.
Operators must ensure that the DP1100i drill’s water injection system is operational to reduce dust and maintain drill bit life.
The LH517 loader has an integrated weighing system that allows operators to monitor load weights in real time for enhanced productivity.
The CV217 VSI crusher is ideal for producing fine aggregates and features a modular design for easy maintenance.
The TH551i truck is equipped with anti-roll-back technology, ensuring safe operation on steep inclines.
The DD421i drill rig offers a remote monitoring system that provides performance data directly to the control room.
The LH410 loader’s quick-attach coupler system enables rapid switching between different buckets and attachments.
The CH870 cone crusher is designed for high-capacity crushing and features adjustable settings to optimize output.
The MT65 truck includes an advanced cooling system, ensuring consistent engine performance even in extreme heat.
The DP1500i drill rig features a hydraulic mast raising system, enabling quick setup and dismantling at job sites.
The LH621 loader’s ergonomic cabin design minimizes operator fatigue during long shifts, improving productivity.
The QJ341 mobile jaw crusher has a reverse crushing action to clear blockages and ensure continuous operation.
The TH320 truck can be equipped with an optional fire suppression system for enhanced safety in flammable environments.
The DD422iE drill uses electric power to reduce emissions and improve operational efficiency in underground mining.
The LH514 loader’s advanced air filtration system ensures clean air circulation in the operator cabin.
The CV228 VSI crusher’s wear parts can be easily replaced without specialized tools, reducing maintenance time.
The TH545i truck features a variable payload monitoring system that adjusts engine power based on load weight.
The DR410i drill rig’s operator cabin includes climate control and noise suppression for increased operator comfort.
The LH621 loader’s high-strength bucket is engineered to handle abrasive materials without compromising durability.
The CH550 cone crusher’s integrated control system enables real-time adjustments to optimize performance.
The MT42 truck’s engine meets Tier 4 emission standards, making it environmentally compliant and fuel-efficient.
